description: Manages the local calendar server and synchronizes with iCloud CalDAV, providing capabilities for event creation, querying, updating, deletion, and synchronization control.

actions.create: Create a new event and immediately sync it to the configured iCloud calendar.
actions.update: Update an existing event by UID and synchronize the changes to the remote server.
actions.delete: Delete an event by UID; can optionally soft-delete (mark as deleted locally without removing from remote).
actions.read: Read a single event record and return its full details.
actions.list: Filter and list events by calendar name and time range; optionally include deleted records.
actions.push: Manually trigger the synchronization process; supports incremental and full modes.
actions.status: Query server status and recent synchronization information.

payload.description: Object – Required. Contains all fields needed to create an event. Missing required fields will cause the server to reject the request.

fields.calendarName: String – Required. The calendar name to write into, mapped to the local cache and remote CalDAV displayName.
fields.startISO: String – Required. Event start time (ISO 8601 UTC), e.g., 2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z.
fields.endISO: String – Required. Event end time (ISO 8601 UTC); must not be earlier than startISO.
fields.description: String – Optional. Event description; defaults to an empty string.
fields.location: String – Optional. Event location; defaults to an empty string.
fields.attendees: Array<Object> – Optional. List of participants; each object may include fields such as address(String), name(String), role(String), compatible with CalDAV. Defaults to an empty array.
fields.reminders: Array<Object> – Optional. Reminder configuration compatible with CalDAV (e.g., { type: 'display', minutesBefore: 30 }). Defaults to an empty array.
fields.recurrenceRule: String – Optional. Recurrence rule in RFC 5545 RRULE format. Defaults to null.
fields.metadata: Object – Optional. Custom metadata; must be a normal object and cannot be an array. Defaults to an empty object.
fields.etag: String – Optional. Remote event version identifier; server fills automatically during sync if omitted.
fields.url: String – Optional. The event's CalDAV URL; server fills this after successful sync if omitted.

update.uid: String – Required. UID of the event to update.

payload.description: Object – Required. Contains only the fields intended to be modified. Other fields remain unchanged.

fields.calendarName: String – Optional. Update the target calendar name.
fields.attendees: Array<Object> – Optional. Full replacement of the attendees array; same structure as create.payload.attendees.
fields.reminders: Array<Object> – Optional. Full replacement of the reminders array; same structure as create.payload.reminders.
fields.recurrenceRule: String – Optional. Updated recurrence rule (RRULE format).
fields.startISO: String – Optional. Updated start time (ISO 8601 UTC).
fields.endISO: String – Optional. Updated end time (ISO 8601 UTC).
fields.metadata: Object – Optional. Replaces the event’s metadata.
fields.lastModified: String – Optional. Custom last-modified timestamp (ISO 8601). Server fills automatically if omitted.
fields.status: String – Optional. Event state marker, such as updated, synced, deleted. If omitted, server determines automatically.
fields.etag: String – Optional. Remote event version identifier, overwriting the cached etag.
fields.url: String – Optional. Remote event CalDAV URL, overwriting the cached url.

delete.uid: String – Required. UID of the event to delete.

options.description: Object – Optional. Parameters controlling deletion behavior.

fields.soft: Boolean – Optional. Default false. If true, marks the event as deleted locally without issuing a remote delete.

read.uid: String – Required. UID of the event to read.

options.description: Object – Optional. Filtering conditions for event listing. If omitted, returns all non-deleted events.

fields.rangeStart: String – Optional. Query start time (ISO 8601 UTC). Events ending before this time are excluded.
fields.rangeEnd: String – Optional. Query end time (ISO 8601 UTC). Events starting after this time are excluded.
fields.includeDeleted: Boolean – Optional. Default false. If true, includes entries marked as deleted.

options.description: Object – Optional. Mode settings for synchronization.

fields.type: String – Optional. Sync mode: incremental (default, sync only changes) or full (full resync).

options.description: Object – Optional. Reserved for diagnostic expansion; no fields currently required.

input.action: String – Specifies the action to execute (create, update, delete, read, list, push, status).
input.payload: Object – Top-level payload depending on the action. Required for create and update. See actionParams for structure.
input.uid: String – Top-level event UID when required. Needed for update, delete, read.
input.options: Object – Top-level options depending on the action. Used by delete, list, push, status. See actionParams for structure.

output.success: Boolean – True when the operation succeeds; false when it fails.
output.result: Returned data on success. For create, update, read, list this includes event records; for push and status this includes sync status.
output.resultType: String – Indicates the type of returned data, such as event, eventList, or status.
output.error: String – Provides error details when success is false.
output.value: Object – Optional. Additional diagnostic information or server-returned details in error scenarios.
